amendment.description: To provide appropriate workers compensation for Federal employees.

action.text: Amendment SA 2034 proposed by Senator Akaka to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2034, under the order of 4/19/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 73.
